paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant rs7789146, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The study identified an enhancer with a nearby risk variant (rs7789146) linked to atrial fibrillation.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is linked to atrial fibrillation and has been validated through functional assays.
